name: Rifts In Time
description: Rifts In Time brings classic platformer gameplay and blends it with unique time-bending mechanics.  Pause, rewind, and even stop time all together!  Travel through time as a Time Keeper trying to save it, without harming it any further! Rifts In Time is in Pre-Alpha Tech Demo phase. It consists of one demo level to try out the time mechanics. All donations will go towards art assets for the final game!
